repo_description: The online to offline is giving consumers the possibility to combine both online and offline buying experiences, into one.  You can test this feature by pulling this project, docker-compose run npm install & docker-compose up and your good to go !

schemas.name: schema.gql
schemas.content:
type Query {
  "General information about this store"
  stores: [StoreInformation]!
}

"General information about a store"
type StoreInformation {
  "Store name"
  name: String!
  "Support phone number"
  phone: String
  "Store address"
  address: String
  "Store owner"
  owner: StoreOwner
  "Store coordinate"
  coordinates: StoreCoordinates
}

"""
The Owner of a store, with contact and personal
information to make the store more human
"""
type StoreOwner {
  gender: Gender
  displayName: String!
  email: String!
  picture(size: ImageSize = medium): String!
}

enum Gender {
  FEMALE
  MALE
  NONBINARY
}

enum ImageSize {
  large
  medium
  thumbnail
}

type StoreCoordinates {
  latitude: Float
  longitude: Float
}
